titleStmt.title: Master Glyn's reply to the Earle of Straffords defence of the severall articles objected against him by the House of Commons Published by speciall direction, out of an authentick copy.
titleStmt.author: Glynne, John, Sir, 1603-1666.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
